name: Freaky Forest
description:
Your friends have been trying to convince you to go camping with them for months, and you’ve finally given in. You help your friends pitch the tent… well, you watch them do it, anyway. They’re still setting up, so you take a stroll down the lakeside, just looking around. You’re not normally outside much.  

It doesn’t take long for you to wander a little too far from the campsite. Suddenly, you look around and realize you can’t see anything but pine trees. You call out, but no one answers. It’s just you, the trees, and whatever’s hiding in them… You look up and see the sun setting. You really don’t want to be stuck out here, alone, when night falls.  

The question is, can you make it back to your friends in one piece? Can you brave mother nature and emerge from these pines victorious? Try your luck in this text-based adventure!
